definition: availability for use, to make someone do something
details:
noun
- availability for use
= example: availability for use
- the power or authority to command
= example: the power or authority to command
- great skillfulness and knowledge of some subject or activity
= example: great skillfulness and knowledge of some subject or activity
= synonyms: control
- (computer science) a line of code written as part of a computer program
= synonyms: instruction
- an authoritative direction or instruction to do something
= synonyms: bid
- a military unit or region under the control of a single officer
- a position of highest authority
= example: a position of highest authority
verb
- to make someone do something
= example: to make someone do something
= synonyms: require
- to be in command of
= example: to be in command of
- to demand as one's due
= example: to demand as one's due
- to exercise authoritative control or power over
= synonyms: control
- to look down on
= synonyms: overlook, dominate, overtop
